org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.query.h2.opt

Class GridH2QueryContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.query.h2.opt.GridH2QueryContext

  • public class GridH2QueryContext
extends Object
    Thread local SQL query context which is intended to be accessible from everywhere.

        @Nullable
public static GridH2QueryContext get()

        Returns:
